NBA.com staff reports-- Allen Iverson 's season is over. The Detroit Pistons said Friday the All-Star guard will miss the rest of the season-- and the playoffs if they make it-- because of a sore back. After talking with Allen Iverson and our medical staff, we feel that resting Allen Iverson for the remainder of the season is the best course of action at this time, Pistons president of basketball operations Joe Dumars said in a statement released by the team.`` While he has played in our last three games, he is still feeling some discomfort and getting him physically ready to compete at

REDMOND, Wash.-- Microsoft Corp. today promoted Senior Vice President Satya Nadella to president of Microsoft's Server and Tools Business. Leading into the earnings news, CFO Patrick Pichette described it as a phenomenal ending to a very incredible year at Google. The company reported$ 2.54 billion in net income on$ 8.44 billion in revenue for the quarter ending Dec. 31, 2010. On the mobile front, Google continues to see momentum grow.

Will he continue to draw lines in the sand far to the left of the electorate or is he going to lurch to the middle the way Bill Clinton did to see if he can come back? The State of the Union is the kickoff of his re-election campaign. `` For a Democratic Bill Clinton to win, you have to move to the center,'' said Mike Pence Martin, a Democratic operative from Missouri.`` This country is not ready for a pure progressive.
